## DayData interface

Data that represents day in date picker

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DayData<TDate = any> extends PeriodData<TDate> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [PeriodData](./datetime.perioddata.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [betweenActive](./datetime.daydata.betweenactive.md) | boolean | Indication that range is selected and this day is between selected dates |
|  [day](./datetime.daydata.day.md) | number | Day number of month |
|  [otherMonth](./datetime.daydata.othermonth.md) | boolean | Indication that this day is out of currently selected month |
|  [today](./datetime.daydata.today.md) | boolean | Indication that this day is today |
|  [weekend](./datetime.daydata.weekend.md) | boolean | Indication that this day is weekend day |
